name: Hyper Securities 2
overview: In Hyper Securities 2 the player has to stop evil doer's from their mischievousplans, on air and in the ground.. use weapons, choppers and cars. The gameplay is a simulation game of a special security unit in the police in the city of Tokyo. The city is divided into 16 districts and your agents will react to the different reports. There is a ranking of security companies and your company will go up or down depending of your action each week. The three girls will improve their stats depending of each week job and the success in those jobs. The player can also talk to his agents and even date them. If the player knocks out the three criminals his company approval ratings up! Beating the competition, Take your security company to the first place! Each week you can order your agents to patrol (after selecting all your cars and asign them to each districs the city and during that week when they encounter a problem an action sequence will take place. The battle part is wait until the enemy target is locked to choose one of the possible attacks (just like an rpg game) or use one of the items to cure yourself.
